data.sentence: The word أَمْ comes from the root ا م and is associated with the meanings:
The word نَحْنُ comes from the root ن ح ن and is associated with the meanings: We
The word مِنَ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From
The word ءَأَنْتُمْ comes from the root ا ن ت م and is associated with the meanings: you (plural)

data.meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
data.sentence: The word أَنْزَلْتُمُوهُ comes from the root ن ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.

data.meanings: Clouds, white clouds or clouds of any kind, clouds containing water.
data.sentence: The word الْمُزْنِ comes from the root م ز ن and is associated with the meanings: Clouds, white clouds or clouds of any kind, clouds containing water.
